definitions.definition_text: occasion, basis, ground or subject for concentration or meditation (relig.), One of the modes of Buddhist meditation which may be called analytical meditation. This meditation on the nature of elementary substances leads to a thorough appreciation of their impermanence and unsatisfactoriness. He who exercises it fixes his mind on any one element and reflects on it in all its conditions and changes until, so far as that element is concerned, he sees that it is only unstable, grievous and ill
